Requests for Proposal
=====================

**CITY OF EL LAGO, TEXAS**

**REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS (RFP)**

**POST DISASTER DEBRIS REMOVAL AND DISPOSAL SERVICES**

The City of El Lago, Texas (the “City”) is located in an area frequently impacted by hurricanes, tropical storms, and other natural disasters. To prepare in advance for future storm events, the City is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide Post-Disaster Debris Removal and Disposal Services on an as-needed basis through December 31, 2028, in accordance with applicable local, State, and Federal Emergency Management regulations.

Copies of the RFP may be obtained by contacting:

City of El Lago

Attn: Jeannie Kubricht, City Secretary

Address: 411 Tallowood Drive, El Lago, TX 77586

Phone: (281) 326-1951

Email: citysec@ellago-tx.gov

Sealed proposals must be received no later than **December 2, 2025 2:00 PM CST** via email to Jeannie Kubricht, City Secretary at [citysec@ellago-tx.gov](mailto:citysec@ellago-tx.gov).

Late proposals will not be accepted. Proposals shall be clearly marked:

*City of El Lago – RFP Response: Post-Disaster Debris Removal and Disposal Services*

The City reserves the right to accept or reject any or all proposals, and to waive any informalities or irregularities, and to award a contract in the best interest of the City.

The City of El Lago is an affirmative action, equal opportunity employer and encourages proposals from minority-owned, women-owned, and historically underutilized businesses.

11/24/2025- Please see the UPDATED bid packet with accurate due date (12/2/2025). Sorry for the inconvenience!

[2025 RFP Post Disaster Debris Removal and Disposal Bid Packet- UPDATED](https://ellago-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/2025-RFP-Post-Disaster-Debris-Removal-and-Disposal-Bid-Packet-UPDATED.pdf)

[2025 RFP Disaster Debris Removal and Disposal – Notice](https://ellago-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/2025-RFP-Disaster-Debris-Removal-and-Disposal-Notice.pdf)

City of El Lago

**Post Disaster Debris Removal and Disposal Bid Schedule**

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **ACTIVITIES** | **DATES** |
| Prepare RFP | 10/29 – 11/4/2025 |
| Issue for RFP | 11/4/2025 |
| 1st. Advertisement | 11/12/2025 |
| 2nd. Advertisement | 11/19/2025 |
| Last Date for Questions | 11/21/2025 |
| Bid Date – Receiving Sealed Proposals | 12/2/2025 |
| Review RFQ and Recommendations | 12/3/2025 |
| Special Council Meeting – Select Bid | 12/4/2025 |
| Submit Application | 12/30/2025 |

**CITY OF EL LAGO, TEXAS**

**REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS (RFP)**

**FOR ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES**

The City of El Lago is soliciting Request for Proposals (RFP) from qualified firms to provide Administrative Services for projects to be funded through the Texas General Land Office (GLO) Community Development Block Grant – Mitigation (CDBG-MIT), Resilient Communities Program (RCP).

Administrative services will include, but are not limited to: project management, financial administration, planning services, recordkeeping, reporting, environmental review coordination, and compliance with applicable federal, state, and GLO requirements for CDBG-MIT programs.

Copies of the RFP may be obtained by contacting:

City of El Lago

Attn: Jeannie Kubricht, City Secretary

Address: 411 Tallowood Drive, El Lago, TX 77586

Phone: (281) 326-1951

Email: citysec@ellago-tx.gov

Sealed proposals must be received no later than December 2, 2025 2:00 PM CST via email to Jeannie Kubricht, City Secretary at [citysec@ellago-tx.gov](mailto:citysec@ellago-tx.gov).

Late proposals will not be accepted. Proposals shall be clearly marked:

“RFP – Administrative Services for CDBG-MIT Resilient Communities Program.”

The City reserves the right to negotiate with any and all individuals or firms that submit proposals, to reject any or all proposals, and to waive any informalities in the RFP process. The City of El Lago is an affirmative action, equal opportunity employer and encourages proposals from minority-owned, women-owned, and historically underutilized businesses.

[RFP Administrative Professional Services – Texas General Land Office (CDBG-MIT)\_ Resilient Communities Program](https://ellago-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/RFP-Administrative-Professional-Services-Texas-General-Land-Office-CDBG-MIT_-Resilient-Communities-Program-RCP_FINAL.pdf)

[Public Notice RFP Administrative Professional Services – GLO RCP](https://ellago-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/Public-Notice_COEL-RCP-Adminstrative-Services-002.pdf)

[RCP RFP Project Schedule](https://ellago-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/COEL-RCP-RFP-Project-Schedule-11.3.2025.pdf)

#### City of El Lago

411 Tallowood Drive  
El Lago, TX 77586

Phone: [281-326-1951](tel:281-326-1951)

#### Office Hours

Monday – Thursday: 9 am to 5 pm    
Friday: 9 am to Noon
